### 1. **Total Alignment Score (1.666667)**

     \[
     \text{total_score} = \frac{\sum (\text{element_score} \times \text{weight})}{\sum \text{weight}}

     \[
     \text{total_score} = \frac{(1.0 \times 1) + (0.0 \times 1)}{2} = \frac{1.0}{2} = 0.5
